game.title: The Dragon's Lair
game.objective: Defeat the powerful dragon in its lair.
game.description: Your mission is to travel to the northern mountains, infiltrate the dragon's lair, and defeat the beast to protect the kingdom.
game.reward: The King's gratitude and 5000 gold coins.

task.description: Your first task is to travel to the northern mountains where the dragon resides. Pack your gear and gear up for the journey.
Once you reach the mountains, you need to locate and infiltrate the dragon's lair. Watch out for traps and minions.
Your final task is to defeat the dragon. Use all your skills and equipment at your disposal to vanquish the beast.
